title: Children of the Dog Star
resume: Children of the Dog Star is a science fiction television program for children produced in New Zealand in 1984. It consists of six episodes of thirty minutes each. It was written by Ken Catran and directed by Chris Bailey, with the novelisation written by Marie Stuttard.
